languages.text: "Однажды я угодила в подобную ловушку — конкуренты заманили меня на сигнал от погибшей команды... Кассхи! Никчемные пираты жестоко поплатились за то, что натворили с моими ребятками".
"I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."
languages.original_text: "Однажды я угодила в подобную ловушку — конкуренты заманили меня на сигнал от погибшей команды... Кассхи! Никчемные пираты жестоко поплатились за то, что натворили с моими ребятками".

traits.locale_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskhas! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."
"I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskhas! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."
"I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskhas! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."
"I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskhas! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

languages.text: “我曾落入过类似的陷阱。我的敌人曾用我死去的手下发出的信号，把我引入了陷阱……那群贱种！我要让那些人渣海盗为他们的所作所为付出代价。”
languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

traits.locale_text: “我曾落入过类似的陷阱。我的敌人曾用我死去的手下发出的信号，把我引入了陷阱……那群贱种！我要让那些人渣海盗为他们的所作所为付出代价。”
“我曾落入过类似的陷阱。我的敌人曾用我死去的手下发出的信号，把我引入了陷阱……那群贱种！我要让那些人渣海盗为他们的所作所为付出代价。”

languages.text: « Je me suis fait avoir comme ça, moi aussi, une fois. J'ai répondu à ce que je croyais être un signal de mon équipage disparu, qui avait en fait été envoyé par des rivaux sans scrupule... Kaskha ! Autant vous dire que je leur ai fait regretter ce qu'ils avaient fait à mes gars. »
languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis fait avoir comme ça, moi aussi, une fois. J'ai répondu à ce que je croyais être un signal de mon équipage disparu, qui avait en fait été envoyé par des rivaux sans scrupule... Kaskhas ! Autant vous dire que je leur ai fait regretter ce qu'ils avaient fait à mes gars. »

languages.text: «Yo también caí en una trampa así una vez... mis rivales me atrajeron a una señal de mi equipo muerto... ¡Kaskha! Me aseguré de que esos piratas pagaran por lo que habían hecho con mis muchachos».
languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también caí en una trampa así una vez... mis rivales me atrajeron a una señal de mi equipo muerto... ¡Kaskhas! Me aseguré de que esos piratas pagaran por lo que habían hecho con mis muchachos».

languages.text: 「昔、似たような罠にハマったよ。死んだアタシのクルーを手紙代わりに、ライバルがアタシをおびき出してきたんだ…ろくでなしだよ！クズ海賊には友達の落とし前をきちんとつけさせてもらったけどね」
languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

traits.locale_text: 「昔、似たような罠にハマったよ。死んだアタシのクルーを手紙代わりに、ライバルがアタシをおびき出してきたんだ…ろくでなしだよ！クズ海賊には友達の落とし前をきちんとつけさせてもらったけどね」
「昔、似たような罠にハマったよ。死んだアタシのクルーを手紙代わりに、ライバルがアタシをおびき出してきたんだ…ろくでなしだよ！クズ海賊には友達の落とし前をきちんとつけさせてもらったけどね」

languages.text: "Ich bin einmal in eine ähnliche Falle geraten. Meine Rivalen haben mich zu einem Signal von meiner toten Crew gelockt ... Kaskha! Ich habe diese widerwärtigen Piraten dafür bezahlen lassen, was sie meinen Jungs angetan haben."
languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin einmal in eine ähnliche Falle geraten. Meine Rivalen haben mich zu einem Signal von meiner toten Crew gelockt ... Kaskhas! Ich habe diese widerwärtigen Piraten dafür bezahlen lassen, was sie meinen Jungs angetan haben."

languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskhas! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

languages.text: "Bir keresinde ben de benzer bir tuzağa düşmüştüm. Rakiplerim, ölmüş bir tayfamın yolladığı sinyalle beni kandırmıştı. Kaşka! O adi korsanlara, benimkilere yaptıklarının bedelini ödetmiştim."
languages.original_text: "I fell into a similar trap once — my rivals lured me to a signal from my dead crew... Kaskha! I made sure those worthless pirates paid for what they did to my boys."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde ben de benzer bir tuzağa düşmüştüm. Rakiplerim, ölmüş bir tayfamın yolladığı sinyalle beni kandırmıştı. Kaşka! O adi korsanlara, benimkilere yaptıklarının bedelini ödetmiştim."
